item.title: Fly-tipping, 17th October
item.description:

item.title: Weeding mess left on roadside, 17th October
item.description:
Mount Pleasant Road appears to have been weeded but coupled with the mess the refuse collectors left yesterday and the unswept weeding debrisâ€™s everywhere, and left in piles in the road verges..the street looks a mess. This will get worse as parking messes upâ€¦or if it starts raining will be clogging the drains! Please complete and finish the job! Lewisham Streets are a disgrace as it isâ€¦so having the Local Authority Services adding to the issue is not acceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Mount Pleasant Road, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
